title: Figure out an estimate of your wedding budget
description: Create an estimate of how much you want to spend on your budget. You can AfriWeddings bugdet tool to keep track of your expenses.

title: Share your engagement with family and friends!
description: Congratulations, you are one step closer to your happy ever after! Share the good news with family and friends.

title: Decide if you want a wedding planner
description: Planning a wedding is not easy. Take the stress of you and partner by getting some help planning the wedding with a planner

title: Start looking for venues for your special day
description: You can start shortlisting venues by using a  location (e.g city, country) and time of year. Be flexible with your dates because plans change.

title: Start planning your guest list
description: You can use AfriWeddings Guest List Tool to create one and allow guests to RSVP with our platform.

title: Decide your weddings details such as theme and colour scheme
description: Consider what colors form the main theme of your wedding. Remember to factor in season, venue and culture

title: Invite your wedding party
description: You can use AfriWeddings to invite your wedding party to your weddingssuch as your maid of honour, bridesmaids, best man and ushers

title: Start making enquires for venues for your special day
description: Using your shortlist of wedding venues and dates in mind created in the planning stage, set up some appointments to tour the facilities and compare prices.

title: Start collecting guest list details such email and contact numbers
description: You can use AfriWeddings to collect addresses, emails and phone numbers of guests using the Guest List feature

title: Book your venue and set the date!
description: Reserve venues for your  engagement, wedding ceremony and reception.

title: Reserve your catering vendor
description: Identify some catering vendors and reserve one for events

title: Create your wedding website using AfriWeddings
description: Share your wedding date, schedue, love story, collect RSVPs and add answer FAQ on your weddings using AfriWeddings!

title: Research and shortlist photographers/ videographers vendors
description: Your wedding photos are one of the most important memories of your special day so spend extra time picking the right photographer/videographer vendor

title: Create a backup plan for events such as bad weather
description: Discuss with your venue provider of plan B options such as bad weather

title: Research music and entertainment for your reception
description: Start planning on how you want to entertain guests such as live band, DJ. Think about any cultural elements you want to add

title: Meet with shortlisted photographers/videographers
description: Your wedding photos are one of the most important memories of your special day so spend extra time picking the right photographer/videographer vendor

title: Start shopping for your wedding outfits
description: Start shortlisting your dresses, suits or bridesmaid gowns!

title: Review the guest list you created on AfriWeddings
description: If required, you can add or remove from the list using AfriWeddings

title: Confirm thewedding party you invited on AfriWeddings
description: Make sure all invited guests accept their email invitations on AfriWeddings

title: Book your photographer/ videographer
description: After booking your photographer, make sure you discuss a few poses and angles that you would like. It is easier to show existing wedding photos that you like as a reference.

title: Create and order your wedding invitations
description: Start personalising your save the dates with your wedding theme and colour scheme alongside your engagement photos.

title: Book your music and entertainment vendors for you reception
description: Good music defines an amazing reception experience.

title: Start researching outfits for your wedding party
description: Outfits like tuxes for groomsmen and dresses for bridesmaids.

title: Come up with a wellness plan to look amazing for your wedding
description: Eating right and exercise will help you prevent stress and look stunning on your big day

title: Reserve accommodation for your guests
description: Make sure to put accommodation information on your AfriWeddings wedding page so guests will be made aware.

title: Start researching on florists
description: Research on florists that can meet your dream theme and colour scheme.

title: Get in touch with your local registry office
description: Make time to research on the legal processes in your region because requirements can vary.

title: Research on decoration vendors for your ceremony and reception
description: Research on the decoration vendors and discuss things like Lighting, centrepieces, balloons and rentals

title: Start researching invitation designers
description: Research invitation designers to get some ideas for your wedding stationery - schedule some appointments to shortlist them.

title: Book your florist
description: Make sure to book the florist you decided to go with.

title: Research wedding rings
description: Decide on the type of wedding rings to help your research whether Gold, silver, platinum

title: Research on honeymoon destinations
description: Research destinations for your first holiday as a married couple.

title: Make appointments at wedding boutiques and/or suit shops
description: Its always good to have a second opinion. Make sure to bring some friends along.

title: Select your wedding attire and schedule your first fitting
description: Congratulation, you are one step closer to your special day!

title: Meet with your religious officiant, celebrant or registrar
description: Try to meet your religious official to discuss requirements and arrangements.

title: Research on rentals like marquees, place settings, chairs, and aisle runners for your wedding decoration
description: Find rentals that will make your venue feel unique and match your wedding theme and colour scheme.

title: Research headpieces and veils
description: Research on cathedral length veils, flower crowns and hair vines.

title: Create a gift list
description: Personalise your gift list based on your needs. Make sure to include a variety of items and price points.

title: Confirm your honeymoon destination plans
description: Its time to relax after having a successful wedding with AfriWeddings

title: Research cake makers and schedule a tasting
description: Research on cake options for your reception and schedule a tasting in the process

title: Send your wedding invitations
description: Make sure that the addresses you have on AfriWeddings are up-to-date. Share your AfriWeddings wedding page to those that may not have it.

title: Order your invitations and thank you cards
description: Order your invitations and thank you cards including envelopes

title: Book your wedding musician(s)
description: Book your music and entertainment vendors for every stage of your special day.

title: Book your decor vendors
description: Rememeber to book your decor vendors for items such as rentals, chairs, lighting

title: Book transportation for you and for your guests
description: Make sure to book vendors for your transportation arrangements

title: Start researching hair and makeup vendors
description: Start doing research for the perfect makeup and hair team that will make you look amazing on your special wedding day.

title: Book your cake vendor
description: Make sure to book your cake vendor.

title: Follow up on wedding invitations
description: Follow up on guests to confirm invitation/ to RSVP on AfriWeddings

title: Book your hair and makeup vendors
description: Book in at least one hair and makeup trial before your big day to make sure you have selected the ideal vendor you want for your big day.

title: Use your AfriWeddings wedding page to collect information from your guests (RSVPs, meal selections, etc.)
description: Collect details from your guests such as dietary requirements, songs, who needs a hotel room, and who's bringing a plus one - using RSVP section on your AfriWeddings page

title: Start legal steps to get married
description: Start gathering legal documents to take to your local registry office such as proof of ID, address, etc.

title: Research and make arrangements for your groomsmen suits/ outfit
description: It's time for the groom/grooms and groomsmen to find their perfect look

title: Book accommodation for your wedding night
description: Find a romantic accommodation to make your wedding night special.

title: Arrange the wedding rehearsal
description: Practice makes your wedding day perfect!

title: Make sure your wedding party has ordered their outfits
description: You can make an announcement to the wedding party using your AfriWeddings wall to make sure everyone's outfit has been ordered.

title: Think of wedding ring engravings
description: Make your wedding rings even more special with quotes, dates and initials .

title: Purchase outfit accessories
description: Make sure you purchase all the outfit accessories like Shoes, jewellery, headpieces, pocket squares that will make everyone look fabolous on your special day.

title: Send your wedding invitations
description: Don't forget to send your wedding invitations so everyone can attend your special day!

title: Buy your guest book
description: Make sure to have your guest book for your wedding

title: Buy your wedding rings
description: Congratulations!! you're one step closer to your special day

title: Research/book a wedding day coordinator
description: Make sure your day is perfect by having someone coordinating your day. Your wedding planner can also serve as your wedding day coordinator.

title: Check on travel documents and country requirements
description: Check on travel documents and country requirements such as  passports, vaccines and visas!

title: Do a trial run with your hair stylist/ barber
description: Six weeks before your wedding is ideal to have a hair trial with your new look.

title: Buy a wedding gift for your spouse-to-be
description: Surprise your spouse-to-be with a gift on the day of the wedding that tells them how special they are to you.

title: Do a follow up with your photographer/ videographer
description: You can now discuss some ideas on what kinds of shots and poses you'd like on your special day and also you can also share your wedding schedule with them.

title: Finalise hair and makeup styles
description: Its time to finalise hair and makeup styles

title: Confirm and finalise your transportation
description: Make sure to communicate time, place, vehicles and if there are any guests with special needs that will require further assistance.

title: Follow up with your religious officiant, celebrant or registrar and give notice
description: Follow up with your religious officiant, celebrant or registrar and give notice of about 28 full days to 3 months before your wedding day.

title: Confirm your wedding meal selections with your catering vendor
description: Your food suppliers should be aware of any dietary needs. For example allergies or restrictions. Make sure to inform guests to indicate dietary needs on AfriWeddings through the RSVP

title: Book a bartending or alcohol service vendor if needed.
description: Remember to book a bartending or alcohol service vendor if needed.

title: Plan your hair and makeup trial!
description: Make sure to plan your hair and makeup trial and remember to get a second opinion by bringing a friend along

title: Decide on your wedding songs
description: Make sure to send your wedding song/ playlist with your music vendor or DJ.

title: Create a list for all the things you want to take for your wedding/honeymoon
description: Make sure to create a list for all the things you want to take for your wedding/honeymoon. Remember to create some space for souvenirs you would like to bring back.

title: Create your ceremony and reception timelines
description: Create your ceremony and reception timelines using AfriWeddings Schedule feature.

title: Order your place cards, menus and orders of service
description: Include timing, readings, participants and any additional fun details you think your guests will enjoy.

title: Make sure your wedding party knows the timeline
description: Make sure you inform the wedding party to view the wedding schedule on AfriWeddings

title: Buy wedding party gifts
description: Find gifts to say a big thank you to your wedding party for making your big day special.

title: Begin to think of your vows and speeches
description: Decide whether you will write your own vows or give a speech

title: Double check your orders of service and place cards
description: Your stationary designer should send you a sample so make sure every name is right and all the details are correct.

title: Make sure to pick up your rings
description: You are one step closer to your special day.

title: Check the guest list again and contact guests have not RSVP'd
description: Remind them by sending emails or simply calling them to request them to RSVP and this can be done easily using AfriWeddings platform

title: Finalise wedding vows
description: Make sure to proof read and finalise your wedding vows

title: Facilitate another dress or outfit fitting
description: Make an appointment to try on your outfit one last time when you pick it up in a few weeks.

title: Confirm wedding rehearsal time and venue
description: Confirm the rehearsal ceremony details like time and venue and communicate with the required attendees.

title: Finalise and share the seating plan with your reception venue
description: Finalise seating plan on AfriWeddings platform based on confirmed attendees and share it with reception venue

title: Ensure the speeches are ready
description: Ensure the speeches are ready and get ready to make a toast

title: Practice for your first dance
description: Some couples book dance classes or just freestyle. Make it a memorable one!

title: Confirm your witnesses
description: Make sure your witnesses are aware and know what they'll need to do on the day

title: Pick up you and your partner's wedding outfits
description: Have your final fitting and bring the outfit home if it's ready. Make sure its hidden so both of you can't see how amazing the outfits are until the big day

title: Confirm all wedding details with wedding party
description: Keep wedding party informed on everything by using the AfriWeddings wall to post announcements

title: Confirm final details and make all necessary payments to vendors
description: Make sure your supplier team is aware of the requirements of the events and is fully paid

title: Get ready and pack for your honeymoon
description: Make sure all country requirements and travel documents are intact

title: Write a sweet love letter to your partner
description: Write a sweet love letter to your spouse-to-be for when they are getting ready for the wedding to keep thing interesting

title: Pull together any last-minute essentials
description: Safety pins, tissue, ibuprofen, a pen and bottled water are just a few suggestions.

title: Drop off decor to the venue(s)
description: Drop off decor to the venue(s) like  place cards, menus, favours, the guest book, and any other items to your venue.

title: Get Excited. You're done
description: Celebrate a job well done and get some rest - you've got a big day tomorrow.

title: Send a thank you message to family and friends
description: Remember to share a thank you message to family and friends for making your day special with all the love and support
